feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Fix the team invite when there is not stripe key
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • security: Denial of service in http-proxy-middleware - https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c7qv-q95q-8v27 [skip ci] by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/396
  • fix: team invite without stripe by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/399

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.6...v1.6.7

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Refresh changes
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase Discord Message Character Limit for Better Compatibility by @aryanp-86 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/401
  • bugfix: #394 Bluesky posts now support "richtext" (URLs, tags, etc) by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/404
  • bugfix: Console warning message instead of stacktrace if OPENAI_API_KEY is not set by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/403
  • bugfix: 300 character limit in Bluesky by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/405
  • Refresh changes by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/407

New Contributors

  • @aryanp-86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.7...v1.6.8

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Quick Refresh Fix
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Increase Discord Message Character Limit for Better Compatibility by @aryanp-86 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/401
  • bugfix: #394 Bluesky posts now support "richtext" (URLs, tags, etc) by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/404
  • bugfix: Console warning message instead of stacktrace if OPENAI_API_KEY is not set by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/403
  • bugfix: 300 character limit in Bluesky by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/405
  • Refresh changes by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/407

New Contributors

  • @aryanp-86 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/401

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.7...v1.6.9

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Hot fix for LinkedIn pages not loading pages
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Linkedin problems in load companies by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/419
  • Add posthog analytics by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/409
  • Add posthog analytics by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/410
  • identification by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/413
  • bugfix: Ignore cloudflare in config checker, as it is no longer needed. by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/415
  • Fix: removed unused variables, exported name as a property of default import #381 by @bilalmirza74 in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/411
  • feature: Responsive launches UI by @jamesread in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/416

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.6.9...v1.6.10

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Quick Fix for uploading, confusing instagram
